Package org.lwjgl.nanovg

Class BNDnodeTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.nanovg.BNDnodeTheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class BNDnodeTheme
extends Struct
implements NativeResource
    Describes the theme used to draw nodes.

    Member documentation

    • nodeSelectedColor – inner color of selected node (and downarrow)
    • wiresColor – outline of wires
    • textSelectedColor – color of text label when active
    • activeNodeColor – inner color of active node (and dragged wire)
    • wireSelectColor – color of selected wire
    • nodeBackdropColor – color of background of node
    • noodleCurving – how much a noodle curves (0 to 10)

    Layout

    
 struct BNDnodeTheme {
     NVGcolor nodeSelectedColor;
     NVGcolor wiresColor;
     NVGcolor textSelectedColor;
     NVGcolor activeNodeColor;
     NVGcolor wireSelectColor;
     NVGcolor nodeBackdropColor;
     int noodleCurving;
 }

      • BNDnodeTheme

        public BNDnodeTheme​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a BNDnodeTheme instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
